Other infections
Chickenpox 
Chickenpox (varicella) causes 
a blistering, itchy rash and mild 
temperature in most people, 
although it can be more 
serious in pregnant women 
and	may	adversely	affect	your	
baby.
Around 95% of women are 
immune to chickenpox from 
having had the infection as 
a child, although this may 
be lower in women who 
were born outside the UK 
and Ireland. Most women 
are ther
